coreAtributes.authorTag: A tag sewn into the inside of the tounge of each boot reads "MFD by DSG Tanning Co."
coreAtributes.name: tactical combat boots
coreAtributes.description: A pair of sturdy combat boots. Unlike their traditional counterparts, these take elements from athletic shoes to improve the wearer's speed and agility at the expense of some durability.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] the boots on and [npc.verb(adjust)] the laces until they're comfortable. [npc.She] then [npc.verb(wind)] the laces around the upper a few times, [npc.verb(tie)] a strudy knot and [npc.verb(tuck)] the excess neatly between the lacing and the toungue.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the boots and [npc.verb(adjust)] the laces until they're comfortable. [npc.She] then [npc.verb(wind)] the laces around the upper a few times, [npc.verb(tie)] a strudy knot and [npc.verb(tuck)] the excess neatly between the lacing and the toungue.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(stuff)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the boots and [npc.verb(pull)] the laces as tightly as possible before tying a hasty knot.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the laces and pull the boots from [npc.her] [npc.feet].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the laces and pull the boots from [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(rip)] the lace open and yank the boots from [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet].
